page.title: 08Home Life in Crowthorne
page.content:
{Extracts from Joanne's Friday diary.
I wake up at 6.45 a.m. and after showering and dressing we have break- fast of egg, toast and cereal at 7.20. My brother and I then practice the violin and piano for one hour.
We go to the village by car and get dropped off at the dairy car park so we can climb over the wall leading to the Morgan rec.
After registration we have R.E. then French. We have a new book called "Tricolore".
At break we have our lunch so that we can do all our homework at lunchtime.
I walk the 1.6km home.
